extendedInfo.description: ==============================================We apologize for letting this app die we became very busy with other works, however, starting today (November 7th) we have began to work on this project again. We plan to update soon and will be working on the following: support for Galaxy Nexus JB, and Samsung Galaxy S3 support. If you would like to suggest other points to work on follow us at @init2winitapps on twitter and mention us to contact us. ==============================================Now supports UNLIMITED slots! and much more see the changelog http://bit.ly/ozsFFaNew permissions are for syncing sms and phone logs across ROMs!Read all of this and check if your device is supported!Boot Manager is Android's first multi-boot application. It allows you to install boot ROMs from your sdcard and boot between then with just a reboot. The application acts as your recovery for your sdcard slots. Install your kernels, themes, and ROMs all through the app and use your normal recovery for your phone ROM only.IF YOU HAVE UPDATED SUPERUSER APK YOU NEED TO DISABLE LOGGING IN THE SUPERUSER APP. IT IS A BUG IN SUPERUSER AND WILL CAUSE ISSUES WITH BOOTMANAGERManual to the app athttp://init2winitapps.com/stories/BMManual.htmlPlease Read the Manual :)If you have questions stop by the forumhttp://forum.init2winitapps.comREQUIRESROOTS-OFF for HTC devices or unlocked bootloader for others(This doesn't apply to 2nd Init devices)Current Supported DevicesSamsung Galaxy NexusHTC DesireHTC Desire HDHtc Desire SHTC Desire ZHtc Evo 3DHTC EVO 4GHTC G2(aka Vision)HTC Incredible 1Htc Incredible 2Htc Incredible SHTC Inspire4gHTC MyTouch 4GHTC Nexus OneHtc SensationHTC ThunderboltHTC RezoundMotorola Droid 1Motorola Droid 2Motorola Droid 2 GlobalMotorola Droid XMotorola RazrBootManager will not work with Samsung devices that are not listed because of the way Samsung handles the boot partition. Motorola phone's with a locked bootloader will also not currently work. Check compatible phones above.We stand 100% behind our apps and will refund anyone who has issues no questions asked.BEFORE LEAVING ONE STAR EMAIL US AT SUPPORT@INIT2WINITAPPS.COMIF YOUR HAVING ISSUES EMAIL US BEFORE RATING WE CAN'T REPLY TO COMMENTS!tags: init 2 winit, init2winit, init2winitapps, boot manager, rom manager, android, droid, root, multi, dual, boot, bootmanager, rom, manage, dualboot, multiboot

reviews.title: Inspiring
reviews.comment: So much potential that I have to buy it in order to support creativity! I just hope that this app can be used for my future phones! Nevertheless, my second rooted app that I\'ve bought! Thanks for this creating convenience for my insatiable desire to flash roms ; )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: JB has been out for a year and no support..
reviews.comment: I bought this app for my DX, then I upgraded to the GNex just as jellybean dropped.. Haven\'t even been able to use this app since then... No updates or anything. Please fix soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!! Turn my dinc into a powerhouse
reviews.comment: It was very helpful in flashing to cricket. Loaded a stock rom while keeping my real one. Easily flashed an update to my cm7.1 and am also running ics via miui. POWERHOUSE !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: License check? I PAID.
reviews.comment: I can\'t download this app unless I paid for it. Get rid of the broken license check. It says invalid license for no reason.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still great!
reviews.comment: On my Gnex (Jelly Bean), needs some work! Will her 5 star when I stop getting fcs and ROMs not installing :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it is ok
reviews.comment: just needed to disable logs in super user,   when will there be any update for jelly bean, by the way, is the developer dead?, he never reply to any request (update) I learnt that the whole developing team died in an airplane crash and therefore no updates or email responses are expected from the team that developed the app (update) the team resurrected and promised to update the app (update) the team is trying to get rid of the app by handing it over to other developer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I\'m running two of the latest ICS ROMs with no problems.  I did have to install the ROM in slot 1 on my phone to create a nandroid because that\'s the only way it would install.  I restored the backup of my phone ROM (CleanROM DE 1.4) and installed slot 1 ROM (Ineffabilis Deus 1.0) from the nandroid and can now run either with no problems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Just boots to Google screen then stops when trying to boot a rom from my saved slots, have to pull battery an restore rom from clockwork mod recovery everytime on my galaxy nexus.Constant force closes an crashes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: This app is great! It allows me to test new roms before I upgrade to them. Well worth the investment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: N\303\243o funciona com Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean)
reviews.comment: The developers promise but not develop... C\'mon, turn back to work! There are a lot of scripts and solutions posted in xda forums, for instance.  Does not work with Android 4.1+ (Jelly Bean). The support forum is not answering the questions. N\303\243o funciona com Android 4.1+ (Jelly Bean). O f\303\263rum de suporte n\303\243o responde \303\240s perguntas.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: B.S. not updated.
reviews.comment: Looks like about a year since they added a new phone.... I paid for the app and upgraded!  Add HTC one support for improved rating
reviews.author: Luke Tamburello

reviews.title: Top app
reviews.comment: So good. Learn how to use it and ask devs if needed. Got sense 3.5 and a beta ice on my dhd. Happy customer for months. Cheers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Evo LTE Still Not Supported
reviews.comment: Not one response on when this app will suppot my phone. Other than that it\'s great for rom flash happy people.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Got a few glitches
reviews.comment: I thought the devs were in it to win it.... I don\'t think so! Need to get it working on tmobile Samsung galaxy 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: The interface is pretty straight forward, intuitive. However, it doesn\'t work with Galaxy Nexus JB 4.1.1, as already noted in the comments below.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App is dead.
reviews.comment: Does not work on jellybean. Don\'t expect any updates neither.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rom magic
reviews.comment: If you have problems, contact the dev. They get back to you quick, and can usually fix it quick too. Putting ur problem here doesn\'t help u or them. This app rocks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh ... great idea, not so hot execution.
reviews.comment: Purchased the app and I have to agree with some of the other reviews in that it\'s still not ready for prime time, and definitely shouldn\'t be charging for it yet, especially anything more than $0.99 tops. It\'s definitely not as easy as it would seem to be where you just load up some other ROM into a slot and walah, you can boot back and forth between them; 3/4 of the time things just don\'t work. It\'s way too slow in other cases, etc. Development is also very slow (as can be seen by it\'s last release date in April, being the end of September now). I wouldn\'t recommend buying this app until it\'s much further along than it is, assuming it gets anymore development. it seems to have halted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unfinished
reviews.comment: This app is hopeless, it did not complete anything it said it would. I could not install zip files without the app crashing and when I installed roms from nandroid backup the lagged so much that I could not use them. Also the boot loader app would not open in the other roms. I tried everything to get it working and it was still unresponsive. I\'m running it in a sensation xe
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is EVO LTE supported yet???
reviews.comment: We have root and s-off so we meet all the requirements and I\'m dieing to use this app again. Has anyone reported this app to work or can the developers ahead some light on this??
reviews.author: A Google User
